title: Pick up to 5 Mortal Kombat Kharacters that you'd like to see added to League
body:
MK has an ENORMOUS roster, so I'd like to see which 5 characters you'd like to add to the game. Oh, and Shen's skins don't count, so Scorpion and Sub-Zero are fair game.

My picks would be Shao Kahn, Reptile, Nightwolf, Goro, and Quan Chi.
